name: F*ck the Society
description: This piece was made on Nov 2020 & exhibited in Urban Sneakers Society Virtual 2020 (@urbansneakersociety in IG). Long story short, this piece tells that in hype era (sneakers, cars, fashion, etc), we have to stay sane and prioritize our needs first. Own it because of the value and story behind it. Made in Cinema 4D+Arnold with After Effects+Procreate post prod at A4 Landscape took 4 hrs rendering. You'll get A$ real res for first 5 collectors, hit me via twitter @lufthik21
